item.title: The First Computer 2500 BCE
item.description: The abacus is the first instrument designed for computation. I made easy for people to calculate numbers and measurements. It could perform basic arithmetic operations and was the world’s first tabulation machine.

item.title: Objects and Classes in CPP
item.description: And now the topic you have all been waiting for, Objects and Classes. Here is a simple program to demonstrate the syntax and general concept.

item.title: Variables and Data Types
item.description: This is the third post in this OOP with C++ Series. Variables Before going to the definition of variables, let us relate them to old mathematical equations.

item.title: Basics of CPP Quickstart
item.description: Before we actually start OOP, we need to understand the basics of C++. There are fundamentals of every language which you should know even before writting your elementary program.

item.title: Intro to OOP With CPP Series
item.description: Object Oriented Programming (OOP) is a programming paradigm that uses objects to model real-world entities. Sooner or later, every programmer will be familiar with the concept of objects and classes.

item.title: Why there is Need to Re-open Colleges?
item.description: The COVID-19 has resulted in schools shut all across the world. Globally, over 1.2 billion children are out of the classroom.

item.title: My Plans for Second Year of Computer Engineering
item.description: Today So its August 2021 and today is my Second Semester End Sem exam :) wierd right! In short my first year of Computer Engineering is about to end.

item.title: How to start your First Year Computer Science Journey
item.description: Reality Every student has big dreams in college, but unfortunately, some students give up completely till the second or third year.
